title: Ep. 77: 'Designated Survivor' and Political TV Coverage With Jon Favreau
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan, Andy Greenwald, and Jon Favreau team up to break down ABC's new political drama, 'Designated Survivor.' Then, the trio dives into the current political landscape on television and Trump's appearance on 'The Tonight Show' with Jimmy Fallon. 
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
